streamDateTimeFormat.description: DateTime field values should be reported in ISO 8601 formats. You can specify custom formats here.

info.title: DATAGLEN REST API
info.description: The APIs let you manage your data sources, streams and data records on the DataGlen platform. If you do not have a Token, please write us to contact@dataglen.com for an account. This page also documents DataGlen’s APIs for remote management of Solar Plants.

get.description:
Manage your data sources on the DataGlen platform.

Returns a list of sources that are owned by you.
get.summary: Returns a list of sources that are owned by you

post.description:
Manage your data sources on the DataGlen platform.

Create a new data source.

parameters.description: Details of the new source to be created.
parameters.name: body

201.description: Success. Accompanied with details of the new source.

400.description: If any of the essential parameters are missing (BAD_REQUEST).

409.description: If a source with the mentioned name already exists (DUPLICATE_SOURCE).

delete.description:
Manage your data sources on the DataGlen platform.

Delete a data source.

204.description: Success. The source has been deleted.

400.description: If the specified source key does not exist (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY).

get.description:
Manage your data sources on the DataGlen platform.

Get a source with the mentioned key.

400.description: If the specified source key does not exist (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY).

get.summary: Get a source with the mentioned key

patch.description:
Manage your data sources on the DataGlen platform.

Update an existing data source.

parameters.description: Updated details of the source.
parameters.name: body

201.description: Success. Accompanied with updated details of the source.

400.description: If any of the essential parameters are missing or invalid (BAD_REQUEST) or If the specified source key does not exist (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY).

409.description: If a source with the mentioned name already exists (DUPLICATE_SOURCE).

get.description:
Manage your streams

Get a list of streams for a source.

400.description: If the source key mentioned is invalid (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY).

get.summary: Get a list of streams for a source

post.description:
Manage your streams

Create a new data stream.

parameters.description: Details of the new stream to be created.
parameters.name: body

201.description: Success. Accompanied with details of the new stream.

400.description: If the source key mentioned is invalid (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY) or If any of the essential parameters are missing/invalid (BAD_REQUEST).

409.description: If a stream with the mentioned name OR position already exists (DUPLICATE_STREAM).

get.description:
Manage your streams

Get a stream with the mentioned key.

400.description: If the specified source key does not exist (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY) or If the specified stream name does not exist (INVALID_DATA_STREAM).

get.summary: Get a stream with the mentioned key

patch.description:
Manage your streams

Update an existing data stream.

parameters.description: Updated details of the stream.
parameters.name: body

400.description: If the specified key does not exist (INVALID_DATA_STREAM) or If the specified source key does not exist (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY).

204.description: Success. The source has been deleted.

400.description: If the specified source key does not exist (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY) or If the specified stream name does not exist (INVALID_DATA_STREAM).

get.description:
Manage your data records

Get a list of data records for a source and a set of streams. In a single call, 1000 latest records will be sent.

parameters.description: Start time of data lookup. It should be in ISO 8601 format. If there's no timezone mentioned, the default timezone will be of the source.
parameters.name: startTime

parameters.description: End time of data lookup. It should be in ISO 8601 format. If there's no timezone mentioned, the default timezone will be of the source.
parameters.name: endTime

parameters.description: A comma separated list of stream names that should be included in the data. If this parameter is not specified, all streams will be included.
parameters.name: streamNames

400.description: If essential parameters are not specified in the request or dates are not mentioned in the correct format (BAD_REQUEST) or If the source key mentioned is invalid (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY) or If there is an invalid stream present in streamsNames (INVALID_DATA_STREAM)

get.summary: Get a list of data records for a source and a set of streams

post.description:
Manage your data records

Write a new data record. Payload should be in the semantics as specified in the sensor configuration.

parameters.description: Actual body.
parameters.name: body

200.description: Success. New record has been written into the database.

400.description: If any of the essential parameters are missing (BAD_REQUEST ) or If the data provided in the request body is not proper as per the data units of streams (INVALID_DATA) or If the source key mentioned is invalid (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY) or If the source is inactive (SOURCE_INACTIVE) or If there is an error retrieving the payload (ERROR_RETRIEVING_PAYLOAD) or If there is an error splitting multiple records (ERROR_SPLITTING_RECORDS) or If there is an error in parsing multiple streams (ERROR_SPLITTING_STREAMS).

get.description:
Manage your action streams

Get a list of action streams for a source.

400.description: If the source key mentioned is invalid (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY).

get.summary: Get a list of action streams for a source

post.description:
Manage your action streams

Create a new action data stream.

parameters.description: Details of the new stream to be created.
parameters.name: body

201.description: Success. Accompanied with details of the new stream.

400.description: If the source key mentioned is invalid (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY) or If any of the essential parameters are missing/invalid (BAD_REQUEST).

409.description: If a stream with the mentioned name OR position already exists (DUPLICATE_ACTION_STREAM).

post.summary: Create a new action data stream

delete.description:
Manage your action streams

Delete an action data stream.

204.description: Success. The source has been deleted.

400.description: If the source key mentioned is invalid (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY) or If the specified action stream does not exist (INVALID_ACTION_DATA_STREAM).

get.description:
Manage your action streams

Get an action stream with the mentioned key.

400.description: If the source key mentioned is invalid (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY) or If the specified action stream does not exist (INVALID_ACTION_DATA_STREAM).

get.summary: Get an action stream with the mentioned key

get.description: Get a list of pending actions for a given source.

400.description: If the source key mentioned in invalid (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY) or If essential parameters are not specified in the request or dates are not mentioned in the correct format.(BAD_REQUEST)

get.summary: Get a list of pending actions for a given source

post.description: Write a new action record. Payload should be in the semantics as specified in the sensor configuration.

parameters.description: Actual body.
parameters.name: body

201.description: Success. New action has been written into the database.

400.description: If the source key mentioned is invalid (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY) or If any of the essential parameters are missing/invalid (BAD_REQUEST) or If there is an error retrieving the payload (ERROR_RETRIEVING_PAYLOAD) or If there is an error splitting multiple records (ERROR_SPLITTING_RECORDS) or If there is an error in parsing multiple action streams (ERROR_SPLITTING_STREAMS) or If the data provided in the request body is not proper as per the data units of streams (INVALID_DATA).

get.description:
Manage your config streams

Get a list of config streams for a source.

400.description: If the source key mentioned is invalid (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY).

get.summary: Get a list of config streams for a source

post.description:
Manage your config streams

Create a new config data stream.

parameters.description: Details of the new stream to be created.
parameters.name: body

201.description: Success. Accompanied with details of the new stream.

400.description: If the source key mentioned is invalid (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY) or If any of the essential parameters are missing/invalid (BAD_REQUEST)

409.description: If a stream with the mentioned name OR position already exists (DUPLICATE_CONFIG_STREAM).

post.summary: Create a new config data stream

delete.description:
Manage your config streams

Delete a config data stream.

204.description: Success. The source has been deleted.

400.description: If the source key mentioned is invalid (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY) or If the specified config stream does not exist (INVALID_CONFIG_DATA_STREAM).

get.description:
Manage your config streams

Get a config stream with the mentioned key.

400.description: If the source key mentioned is invalid (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY) or If the specified config stream does not exist (INVALID_CONFIG_DATA_STREAM).

get.summary: Get a config stream with the mentioned key

get.description: Get a list of pending configs for a given source.

400.description: If the source key mentioned in invalid.(INVALID_SOURCE_KEY) or If essential parameters are not specified in the request or dates are not mentioned in the correct format (BAD_REQUEST).

get.summary: Get a list of pending configs for a given source

post.description: Write a new config record. Payload should be in the semantics as specified in the sensor configuration.

parameters.description: Actual body.
parameters.name: body

201.description: Success. New config has been written into the database.

400.description: If the specified key does not exist (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY) or If any of the essential parameters are missing/invalid (BAD_REQUEST) or If there is an error retrieving the payload (ERROR_RETRIEVING_PAYLOAD) or If there is an error splitting multiple records (ERROR_SPLITTING_RECORDS) or If there is an error in parsing multiple config streams (ERROR_SPLITTING_STREAMS) or If the data provided in the request body is not proper as per the data units of streams (INVALID_DATA).
Bad request

get.summary: Get a list of solar plants

get.description: Get energy generated by the specified plant.

parameters.description: Start time of data lookup. It should be in ISO 8601 format.
parameters.name: startTime

parameters.description: End time of data lookup. It should be in ISO 8601 format.
parameters.name: endTime

parameters.description: It should be HOUR/DAY/FIVE_MINUTES
parameters.name: aggregator

400.description: If the plant slug mentioned is invalid (INVALID_PLANT_SLUG) or If essential parameters are not specified in the request or dates are not mentioned in the correct format (BAD_REQUEST).

get.summary: Get energy generated by the specified plant

get.description: Get a list of inverters for a plant.

400.description: If the specified plant slug does not exist (INVALID_PLANT_SLUG).

get.summary: Get a list of inverters for a plant

get.description: Get an inverter with the mentioned inverter key.

400.description: If the specified plant slug does not exist (INVALID_PLANT_SLUG) or If the specified inverter key does not exist (INVALID_INVERTER_KEY).

get.summary: Get an inverter with the mentioned inverter key

get.description: Get inverter data for a plant slug and inverter key.

parameters.description: Start time of data lookup. It should be in ISO 8601 format.
parameters.name: startTime

parameters.description: End time of data lookup. It should be in ISO 8601 format.
parameters.name: endTime

parameters.description: A comma separated list of stream names that should be included in the data. There has to be at least one stream mentioned.
parameters.name: streamNames

400.description: If the plant slug mentioned is invalid (INVALID_PLANT_SLUG) or If the inverter key mentioned is invalid (INVALID_INVERTER_KEY) or If there is an invalid stream present in streamsNames (INVALID_DATA_STREAM) or If essential parameters are not specified in the request or dates are not mentioned in the correct format (BAD_REQUEST).

get.summary: Get inverter data for a plant slug and inverter key

get.description: Get energy generated by the specified inverter aggregated over a time period.

parameters.description: Start time of data lookup. It should be in ISO 8601 format.
parameters.name: startTime

parameters.description: End time of data lookup. It should be in ISO 8601 format.
parameters.name: endTime

parameters.description: It should be HOUR/DAY/FIVE_MINUTES
parameters.name: aggregator

400.description: If the plant slug mentioned is invalid (INVALID_PLANT_SLUG) or If the inverter key mentioned is invalid (INVALID_INVERTER_KEY) or If essential parameters are not specified in the request or dates are not mentioned in the correct format (BAD_REQUEST).

get.summary: Get energy generated by the specified inverter aggregated over a time period

get.description: Get a plant with the mentioned slug value.

400.description: If the specified plant slug does not exist (INVALID_PLANT_SLUG).

get.summary: Get a plant with the mentioned slug value
